original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Buddhavagga
analyzed: buddha vagga

original: 8. Dussīlapañha
analyzed: dussīla pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, gihidussīlassa ca samaṇadussīlassa ca ko viseso, kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ, ubhopete samasamagatikā, ubhinnampi samasamo vipāko hoti, udāhu kiñci nānākāraṇaṁ atthī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena gihi dussīlassa ca samaṇa dussīlassa ca kaḥ visesaḥ kim nānā karaṇe ubha upete samasama gatikāḥ ubhinnam pi samasamaḥ vipākaḥ hoti udāhu kiñci nānā kāraṇam atthi iti

original: “Dasayime, mahārāja, guṇā samaṇadussīlassa gihidussīlato visesena atirekā, dasahi ca kāraṇehi uttariṁ dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti.
analyzed: dasa yime mahā rāja guṇā samaṇa dussīlassa gihi dussīlataḥ visesena atirekāḥ dasahi ca kāraṇehi uttarim dakkhiṇam visodheti

original: Katame dasa guṇā samaṇadussīlassa gihidussīlato visesena atirekā?
analyzed: katame dasa guṇā samaṇa dussīlassa gihi dussīlataḥ visesena atirekā

original: Idha, mahārāja, samaṇadussīlo buddhe sagāravo hoti, dhamme sagāravo hoti, saṅghe
analyzed: idha mahā rāja samaṇa dussīlaḥ buddhe sa gāravaḥ hoti dhamme sa gāravaḥ hoti saṅghe

original: sagāravo hoti, sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo hoti, uddesaparipucchāya vāyamati, savanabahulo
analyzed: sagāravaḥ hoti sabrahmacārīsu sagāravaḥ hoti uddesa paripucchāya vāyamati savana bahulo

original: hoti, bhinnasīlopi, mahārāja, dussīlo parisagato ākappaṁ upaṭṭhapeti, garahabhayā
analyzed: hoti bhinna sīlaḥ api mahā rāja dussīlaḥ parisa gataḥ ākappam upaṭṭhapeti garaha bhayā

original: kāyikaṁ vācasikaṁ rakkhati, padhānābhimukhañcassa hoti cittaṁ, bhikkhusāmaññaṁ upagato hoti.
analyzed: kāyikam vācasikam rakkhati padhāna abhimukham ca assa hoti citta bhikkhu sāmaññam upagataḥ hoti

original: Karontopi, mahārāja, samaṇadussīlo pāpaṁ paṭicchannaṁ ācarati.
analyzed: karontaḥ api mahā rāja samaṇa dussīlaḥ pāpam paṭicchannam ācarati

original: Yathā, mahārāja, itthī sapatikā nilīyitvā rahasseneva pāpamācarati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja itthī sapatikā nilīyitvā rahassena iva pāpam ācarati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, karontopi samaṇadussīlo pāpaṁ paṭicchannaṁ ācarati.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja karontaḥ api samaṇa dussīlaḥ pāpam paṭicchannam ācarati

original: Ime kho, mahārāja, dasa guṇā samaṇadussīlassa gihidussīlato visesena atirekā.
analyzed: ime kho mahā rāja dasa guṇā samaṇa dussīlassa gihi dussīlataḥ visesena atirekā

original: Katamehi dasahi kāraṇehi uttariṁ dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti?
analyzed: katamehi dasahi kāraṇehi uttarim dakkhiṇam visodheti

original: Anavajjakavacadhāraṇatāyapi dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, isisāmaññabhaṇḍuliṅgadhāraṇatopi
analyzed: dakkhiṇam visodheti isi sāmañña bhaṇḍuliṅga dhāraṇataḥ pi

original: dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, saṅghasamayamanuppaviṭṭhatāyapi dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, buddhadhammasaṅghasaraṇagatatāyapi
analyzed: dakkhiṇam visodheti saṅgha samayam anuppaviṭṭha tāya api dakkhiṇam visodheti buddha dhamma saṅgha saraṇa gata tāya api

original: dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, padhānāsayaniketavāsitāyapi dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, jinasāsanadharapariyesanatopi
analyzed: dakkhiṇam visodha iti dakkhiṇam visodha iti jina sāsana dhara pariyesanataḥ pi

original: dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, pavaradhammadesanatopi dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, dhammadīpagatiparāyaṇatāyapi
analyzed: dakkhiṇam visodheti pavara dhamma desanataḥ api dakkhiṇam visodheti dhamma dīpa gati parāyaṇa tāya api

original: dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, ‘aggo buddho’ti ekantaujudiṭṭhitāyapi dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti, uposathasamādānatopi
analyzed: dakkhiṇam visodheti aggaḥ buddhaḥ ti dakkhiṇam visodheti uposatha samādānataḥ pi

original: dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti.
analyzed: dakkhiṇam visodha iti

original: Imehi kho, mahārāja, dasahi kāraṇehi uttariṁ dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti.
analyzed: imehi kho mahā rāja dasahi kāraṇehi uttarim dakkhiṇam visodha iti

original: Suvipannopi hi, mahārāja, samaṇadussīlo dāyakānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti.
analyzed: su vipannaḥ api hi mahā rāja samaṇa dussīlaḥ dāyakānam dakkhiṇam visodheti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, udakaṁ subahalampi kalalakaddamarajojallaṁ apaneti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja udakam su bahalam pi kalala kaddama rajaḥ jallam apaneti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, suvipannopi samaṇadussīlo dāyakānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja su vipannaḥ api samaṇa dussīlaḥ dāyakānam dakkhiṇam visodheti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, uṇhodakaṁ sukudhitampi pajjalantaṁ mahantaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ nibbāpeti;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja uṇha udakam su kudhitam pi pajjalantam mahantam aggi kkhandham nibbāpeti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, suvipannopi samaṇadussīlo dāyakānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja su vipannaḥ api samaṇa dussīlaḥ dāyakānam dakkhiṇam visodheti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, bhojanaṁ virasampi khudādubbalyaṁ apaneti;
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja bhojanam khudā dubbalyam apaneti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, suvipannopi samaṇadussīlo dāyakānaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ visodheti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja su vipannaḥ api samaṇa dussīlaḥ dāyakānam dakkhiṇam visodheti

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, tathāgatena devātidevena majjhimanikāyavaralañchake dakkhiṇavibhaṅge veyyākaraṇe—
analyzed: mahā rāja tathāgatena devātidevena majjhima nikāya vara lañchake dakkhiṇa vibhaṅge veyyākaraṇe

original: ‘Yo sīlavā dussīlesu dadāti dānaṁ,
analyzed: yaḥ sīlavā dussīlesu dadāti dāna

original: Dhammena laddhaṁ supasannacitto;
analyzed: dhammena laddham su pasanna citto

original: Abhisaddahaṁ kammaphalaṁ uḷāraṁ,
analyzed: abhisaddaham kamma phalam uḷāra

original: Sā dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhatī’”ti.
analyzed: sā dakkhiṇā dāyakataḥ visujjhati iti

original: “Acchariyaṁ, bhante nāgasena, abbhutaṁ, bhante nāgasena, tāvatakaṁ mayaṁ pañhaṁ apucchimha, taṁ tvaṁ opammehi kāraṇehi vibhāvento amatamadhuraṁ savanūpagaṁ akāsi.
analyzed: acchariya bhante nāgasena abbhuta bhante nāgasena tāvatakam mayam pañham apucchimha tam tvam opammehi kāraṇehi vibhāventaḥ amata madhuram savana upagam akāsi

original: Yathā nāma, bhante, sūdo vā sūdantevāsī vā tāvatakaṁ maṁsaṁ labhitvā nānāvidhehi sambhārehi sampādetvā rājūpabhogaṁ karoti;
analyzed: yathā nāma bhante sūdaḥ vā sūda antevāsī vā tāvatakam masam labhitvā nānāvidhehi sambhārehi sampādetvā rāja upabhogam karoti

original: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, tāvatakaṁ mayaṁ pañhaṁ apucchimha, taṁ tvaṁ opammehi kāraṇehi vibhāvetvā amatamadhuraṁ savanūpagaṁ akāsī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante nāgasena tāvatakam mayam pañham apucchimha tam tvam opammehi kāraṇehi vibhāvetvā amata madhuram savana upagam akāsi iti

original: Dussīlapañho aṭṭhamo.
analyzed: dussīla pañhaḥ aṭṭhamaḥ
